show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #67 Corbitt Wall "Not Enough Gravy"
subtitle: #67 Corbitt Wall "Not Enough Gravy"
summary:
This week on the show I have Corbitt Wall from DV Auction, famous for his daily cattle market updates called Feeder Flash.
He joins me on zoom to talk about where he came from, how he developed his knowledge of cattle markets, and then he gives me some education about how does work and what we might be able to do to fix it.
